arts.ttl: Liverpool vs Everton – Match Preview and Team News
arts.sum: The first Merseyside Derby of the season arrives at Anfield on Saturday as Premier League leaders Liverpool host their city rivals, Everton. Arne Slot’s side enter the lunchtime kick-off with a perfect domestic record, having created a new league record by winning their opening four games with late goals.
